title: 820-00163 shuts down during boot
message: only shuts down with the trackpad connected, (powers off mid way through boot) there was liquid on q6060, but thats about it.

title: 820-00163 shuts down during boot
message:
Did you try known good trackpad flex/board?
Check for corrosion on the trackpad connector and circuitry.

title: 820-00163 shuts down during boot
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 54199"]Did you try known good trackpad flex/board?
Check for corrosion on the trackpad connector and circuitry.[/QUOTE]

Yes, we have used 3 known working trackpads and 3 known working cables.
There is no corrosion to any of the trackpad circuitry. I will use the FLIR to see if there are any thermal signs.

We are asking here because we have tried all the obvious steps.

title: 820-00163 shuts down during boot
message:
Monitor SMC_ONOFF_L signal with TP/KB connected.
Machine always works correctly without TP flex (tested with USB mouse/keyboard)?

Do NOT quote an entire post, visible few centimeters above.
Please, maintain forum aesthetic...
